-- Translation of the Neumann-series perturbation statement
-- The actual proof is omitted (sorrY)
import Mathlib

noncomputable section

section
variable {ð•œ : Type*} [NormedField ð•œ]
variable {X Y : Type*} [NormedSpace ð•œ X] [NormedSpace ð•œ Y]

-- Let L : X â†’L[ð•œ] Y be a bounded linear operator which is invertible with bounded inverse.
-- Then there exists Î´ > 0 such that if âˆ¥A - Lâˆ¥ < Î´, A is invertible and âˆ¥Aâ»Â¹âˆ¥ â‰¤ âˆ¥Lâ»Â¹âˆ¥ / (1 - âˆ¥Lâ»Â¹âˆ¥ * âˆ¥A - Lâˆ¥).
lemma neumann_perturbation_delta
  (L : X â†’L[ð•œ] Y)
  (h_inv : âˆƒ Linv : Y â†’L X, Linv.comp L = 1 âˆ§ L.comp Linv = 1) :
  âˆƒ Î´, 0 < Î´ âˆ§ âˆ€ A : X â†’L[ð•œ] Y, âˆ¥A - Lâˆ¥ < Î´ â†’ âˆƒ Ainv : Y â†’L X, A.comp Ainv = 1 âˆ§ Ainv.comp A = 1 âˆ§
    âˆ¥Ainvâˆ¥ â‰¤ âˆ¥ Classical.choose h_inv âˆ¥ / (1 - âˆ¥ Classical.choose h_inv âˆ¥ * âˆ¥ A - L âˆ¥)
  := by
  -- proof omitted
  sorry

end
